Trade/Device Name(s): LOCI N-Terminal Pro-Brain Natriuretic Peptide Calibrator (RC623)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dimension® EXL™ integrated chemistry system with LOCI® Module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension® EXL™ LOCI® NTP Calibrator (RC623), a calibrator for N-terminal pro-brain natriuretic peptide on the Dimension® EXL™ chemistry system.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro calibration of the N-terminal pro-brain natriuretic peptide (NTP Cat. No. RF623) method on the Dimension® EXL™ integrated chemistry system with LOCI® Module.
